ygData.subject: Re:  Need  the site pls
ygData.msgSnippet: what you need to do, then is save it to a gif....still kinda big, but not as big as a bmp.....since paint basically sucks,
ygData.messageBody:
what you need to do, then is save it to a gif....still kinda big, but
not as big as a bmp.....since paint basically sucks, <sorry my opinion
and i'm entitled to it> but i'd look into finding a program that can
read bmp and jpeg, and save to jpeg...i know there's plenty out
there...can't think of any off hand, but i know they are out there

The Scotts wrote:

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Sunday, July 11, 1999 4:16 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Need the site pls
> when you take shots in EQ, they will appear as bmp files in
> your EverQuest dtoirectory, and you can open em like that
> and save them as whatever file format you want...i use
> paintshop pro 5, but anything that can read bmp and change
> em to jpeg will work (:
>

>
